feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-19T18:05:04.434622Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;PostgreSQL 重新考虑其基于进程的模型</stitle>; <id>;https://lwn.net/SubscriberLink/934940/3abb2d4086680b78/</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 19T16:59:12.684603Z</updated>; <link href="https://lwn.net/SubscriberLink/934940/3abb2d4086680b78/"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;PostgreSQL 数据库系统正在考虑进行根本性的改变，以摆脱其面向过程的模型。当前的模型作为大量协作进程运行，多年来一直很好地为该项目服务，但也面临着局限性。转向线程模型被视为提高可扩展性和降低开发成本的潜在解决方案。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#postgresql-reconsiders-its-process-based-model" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36393030" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Database Gyms [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cidrdb.org/cidr2023/papers/p27-lim.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T13:59:12.691872Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.cidrdb.org/cidr2023/papers/p27-lim.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;greghn< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=greghn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;机器学习的最新发展已将重点从设计模型转移到为数据库管理系统 (DBMS) 自动化获取高质量的训练数据。本文介绍了数据库健身房的架构，这是一个集成环境，提供统一的 API 以获取高质量的训练数据。数据库健身房的目标是简化 ML 模型训练和评估，以加速自主 DBMS 研究。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#database-gyms-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36380434" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;显示 HN：我的 Hacker News 推荐引擎</stitle>; <id>;https://hn-recommend.julienc.me</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T14:59:12.692566 Z</updated>; <link href="https://hn-recommend.julienc.me"/>; <author>; <name>;julien040</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=julien040</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hn-recommend.julienc.me/og-image.png" style="width: 220px; 高度: 116 像素;" />;<br />;HN 推荐为您提供与 URL 或文本相关的最流行的 Hacker News 帖子。它使用机器学习模型来查找最相似的帖子。它是开源的，可以免费使用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-my-recommendation-engine-for-hacker-news" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36391655" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 Apple 设备上显示比白色更亮的颜色</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/dtinth/superwhite</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T10:59:12.693231Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/dtinth/superwhite"/>; <author>; <name>;ash</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ash</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://github-production-user-asset-6210df.s3 .amazonaws.com/510678/246795850-d4f667fd-7a06-4375-a357-fa4e4e71d4c6.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：191px；" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了 Apple 设备的显示功能，特别是显示比白色更亮的颜色的能力。此功能是通过使用先进技术实现的，并允许在 Apple 设备上呈现更加生动逼真的视觉效果。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#display-brighter-than-white-color-on-apple-devices" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36389285" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Vim 中的纯文本日记</stitle>; <id>;https://peppe.rs/posts/plain_text_journaling/</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-19T12:59:12.693864Z</updated>; <link href="https://peppe.rs/posts/plain_text_journaling/"/>; <author>; <name>;gigatexal</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gigatexal</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://u.peppe.rs/SpF.png" style="宽度: 220px; 高度: 165px;" />;<br />;我用 {neo,}vim、coreutils 和 dateutils 拼凑了一个日志系统。该系统大致基于 Ryder Caroll 的 Bullet Journal 方法。每个目录中有 12 个文件，一年中的每个月一个，编号如下：我更喜欢每周计划，而不是每天创建任务列表，这是我前几周的内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#plain-text-journaling-in-vim" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36390405" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;调试器 Ghidra 类</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/NationalSecurityAgency/ghidra/tree/master/GhidraDocs/GhidraClass/Debugger</id>; <更新>;2023 -06-19T12:59:12.695328Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/NationalSecurityAgency/ghidra/tree/master/GhidraDocs/GhidraClass/Debugger"/>; <author>; <name>;simonpure< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=simonpure</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets. com/69526c60243c737389913c954de9cf741effefcb1228dc7bc68b4ae2a75fab7f/NationalSecurityAgency/ghidra" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;这是Debugger培训班的课件。它旨在直接在 GitHub 或 GitLab 中查看，但也可以在课堂上呈现以供离线查看。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#debugger-ghidra-class" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36390357" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;化学家介绍了制造磷化合物的两步过程</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-06-two-step-phosphorus-containing-chemicals.html </id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T15:59:12.696020Z</更新>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-06-two-step-phosphorus-containing-chemicals. html"/>; <author>; <name>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/researchers-introduce-1.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：138px；" />;<br />;德累斯顿的研究人员在生产含磷化学品方面取得了突破性进展。他们提出了一种创新的合成方法，该方法只需要两个工艺步骤即可完成以前复杂的功能化磷酸盐生产。这项有前途的创新不仅有助于环境保护，而且还能节省大量时间和成本。 ... <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#chemists-introduce-a-two-step-process-for-making-phosphorus-compounds" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36380967" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Slint - 一个用 Rust 编写的用于嵌入式和桌面的声明式 UI 工具包</stitle>; <id>;https: //slint.dev</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T08:59:12.696676Z</更新>; <link href="https://slint.dev"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ogoffart</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ogoffart</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://slint.dev/assets /img/responsive.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：143px；" />;<br />;使用实时预览通过快速迭代完成您的 UI 设计。调整所有内容，例如颜色、动画、几何图形或文本，并立即验证更改。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-slint-a-declarative-ui-toolkit-written-in-rust-for-embedded-desktop" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388821" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Meta 推出 Voicebox：最先进的语音生成 AI 模型</stitle>; <id>; https://ai.facebook.com/blog/voicebox-generative-ai-model-speech/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T16:59:12.697689Z</更新>; <link href="https: //ai.facebook.com/blog/voicebox-generative-ai-model-speech/"/>; <author>; <name>;OkGoDoIt</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =OkGoDoIt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这个请求有问题。我们正在努力尽快修复它。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#meta-introduces-voicebox-state-of-the-art-generative-ai-model-for-speech" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36393262" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我父亲可能不在了，但“我们的”收音机还在继续</stitle>; <id>;https:// www.latimes.com/opinion/story/2023-06-17/fathers-day-radio-memories</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T11:59:12.698251Z</更新>; <link href="https ://www.latimes.com/opinion/story/2023-06-17/fathers-day-radio-memories"/>; <author>; <name>;mirthlessend</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=mirthlessend</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ca-times.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/d0b9e9b/2147483647/strip /true/crop/1769x1179+0+516/resize/840x560!/quality/80/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalifornia-times-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2F92%2F60%2F692fbdd441db9113dd024ea9ccd4%2Fbarbara-rose -killen.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;这是一个块状的黑色收音机，1941 年制造，那年我父亲 12 岁。我 13 岁那年在 1978 年从县垃圾填埋场抢走了它。<a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-father-may-be-gone-but-our-radio-is-still-going" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36375271" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;TypeScript 5.2 的新关键字：'using'</stitle>; <id>;https://www.totaltypescript.com/typescript-5 -2-新关键字使用</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T09:59:12.698779Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.totaltypescript.com/typescript-5-2- new-keyword-using"/>; <author>; <name>;Lwrless</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Lwrless</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://res.cloudinary.com/total-typescript/image/upload/v1687173860/await-using_lalzrw.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;TypeScript 5.2 将引入一个新的关键字 - 'using' - 当它离开范围时，你可以使用它来处理任何带有 Symbol.dispose 函数的东西。这是基于 TC39 提案，最近达到了第 3 阶段，表明它即将进入 JavaScript。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#typescript-5-2-s-new-keyword-using" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388894" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;面向宜家的开发</stitle>; <id>;https://taylor.town/ikea-面向发展</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T15:59:12.699508Z</更新>; <link href="https://taylor.town/ikea-oriented-development"/>; <作者>; <名称>;soopurman</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=soopurman</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://taylor .town/persimmon-box.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 294px;" />;<br />;不要写不可替代的代码。写可以替代的代码。如果你有锤子和螺丝刀，你可以建造宜家家具。其他东西都在盒子里。写代码很容易，但在其中编辑代码很困难。使输入和输出非常清晰；之间的所有内容都是一次性细节。不要让您的代码复杂。它只是代码，它会被重写。保持简单。<a href="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/#ikea-oriented-development" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36371167" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;电力公司斥资数百万对抗缅因州提议的非营利性公用事业</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2023/jun/18/maine-state-run-utility-power-公司</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T16:59:12.700145Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2023/jun/18/maine-state -run-utility-power-companies"/>; <author>; <name>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/cdf4405b6d6ba4f05cbd23edc56864db48d7af1a/0_0_1500_900/master/1500.jpg?width=465&quality=85&dpr=1&s=none" 样式="宽度：220px； height: 132px;" />;<br />;缅因州的居民正面临电力公司发起的数百万美元的运动，以阻止通过敌意收购创建国家级公共电力公司。现有的公用事业公司 Avangrid 和 Enmax，正在花费数百万美元来阻止投票倡议，这可能对脱碳和气候议程产生国家影响。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#power-companies-spend-millions-to-fight-maines-建议不以营利为目的的实用程序" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36392577" target="_blank">; [评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我对 Nix 的第一印象</stitle>; <id>;https://mtlynch.io/notes/nix-first-impressions/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T06:59:12.701032Z</更新>; <link href="https ://mtlynch.io/notes/nix-first-impressions/"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d33wubrfki0l68.cloudfront.net/ae57cc51889fbe1643c1a73bbd2f7e83afe3be70/aac5f/notes/nix-first-impressions/hashimoto-tweet.png" 样式="宽度: 220px; height: 154px;" />;<br />;Nix是一个根据源文件配置软件环境的工具，它允许你在源代码中定义计算机系统的配置，并使系统进入该状态。Nix旨在配置它所在的环境，而 Ansible 旨在通过网络配置系统。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-first-impressions-of-nix" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387874" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;10 亿年前，早期微生物繁盛的“失落世界”</stitle>; <id>;https:// www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-01847-8</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T10:59:12.701698Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nature.com /articles/d41586-023-01847-8"/>; <author>; <name>;gumby</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gumby</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.nature.com/naturecareers/getasset/f562f6e7-2d92-4524-8fb5-df79a7fb34d0/" style="width: 220px; height: 111px;" />;<br />;古代岩石中的脂肪样化合物指向大量以前未知的微生物，这些微生物曾经主宰地球上的复杂生命。古代岩石中的脂肪样化合物指向大量以前未知的微生物曾经主宰地球上复杂生命的微生物。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-lost-world-of-early-microbes-thrived-one-billion-years-ago" target=" _blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36380548" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Sketch.systems</stitle>; <id>;https://sketch.systems< /id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T05:59:12.702486Z</updated>; <link href="https://sketch.systems"/>; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Sketch.systems 是一种基于 David Harel 在 1980 年代开发的状态图形式主义的绘图工具。它允许用户通过单击图表来浏览系统草图。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sketch-systems" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36378731" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;一次在 3 个游戏机上发布独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://juicybeast.com/2016/01/11/releasing-an-indie-game-on -3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially/#2-years</id>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=plateofsoup</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http://juicybeast.com/wp- content/uploads/2016/01/legrimpeur_HD_cropped.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：100px；" />;<br />;一次在 3 个游戏机上发布独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#releasing-an-indie-game-on-3-consoles -at-once-and-failing-financially-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387030" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;比较不同的莱米实例</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T06:59:12.704682Z</updated>; <link href= "https://github.com/maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances/main/lemmy-migration-find-subreddits-communities.jpg " style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;不同Lemmy实例的比较。通过在 GitHub 上创建帐户为 maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances 开发做出贡献。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#comparison-of-different-lemmy-instances" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36387939" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;MusicGen-Looper：从文本提示生成固定 bpm 循环</stitle>; <id>;https://replicate.com/andreasjansson/musicgen-looper</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-19T09:59:12.710442Z</updated>; <link href="https://replicate.com/andreasjansson/musicgen-looper"/>; <author>; <name>;fagerhult</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fagerhult</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;通过MusicGen运行提示生成一段音乐，然后BeatNet检测节拍和强拍.变奏是通过使用 MusicGen 的延续功能创建的，并且所有变奏都经过时间拉伸以精确匹配请求的速度。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#musicgen-looper-generate-fixed-bpm-loops-from-text-prompts" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388919" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 FPGA 上构建网络键值存储</stitle>; <id>;https://adamwalker.github.io/Building-FPGA -KVS/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T05:59:12.711119Z</updated>; <link href="https://adamwalker.github.io/Building-FPGA-KVS/"/>; <author >; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //adamwalker.github.io/images/arty.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于在功能性硬件描述语言 Clash 中构建基于 FPGA 的网络键值存储。它描述了 FPGA 定制的哈希表设计、测试框架及其性能和资源使用情况。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-networked-key-value-store-on-an-fpga" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387477" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;旅游潜艇在潜入泰坦尼克号残骸时失踪</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/ 2023/jun/19/titanic-tourist-submarine-missing-north-atlantic</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T15:59:12.712630Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian .com/uk-news/2023/jun/19/titanic-tourist-submarine-missing-north-atlantic"/>; <author>; <name>;KingOfCoders</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=KingOfCoders</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/ae56c204e01a57345c199d662c89b10e2a17be54/0_50_1500_900/master/1500 .jpg?width=445&quality=85&dpr=1&s=none" style="width: 220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;一艘旅游潜艇在潜水查看 RMS 泰坦尼克号残骸时在北大西洋失踪。搜救任务正在进行中。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tourist-submarine-goes-missing-on-dive-to-wreck-of-titanic" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36392150" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;KDE Plasma 6 已达到“相当宜居”的地步</stitle>; <id>;https://www.phoronix.com /news/KDE-Plasma-6-Fairly-Livable</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T14:59:12.713376Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.phoronix.com/news/ KDE-Plasma-6-Fairly-Livable"/>; <author>; <name>;thepbone</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thepbone</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://www.phoronix.com/assets/categories/kde.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;KDE 开发人员 Nate Graham 认为 Plasma 6 现在“相当适合”，并建议 KDE 开发人员和高级用户开始尝试。他还提到 Plasma 6 足够稳定，他可以在旅行中使用它。 Nate 认为 Plasma 6.0 可能会在 12 月到 3 月之间发布。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kde-plasma-6-has-reached-the-point-of-being-fairly-livable" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36391492" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Apple 想要获得瑞士苹果形象的权利</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wired.com/故事/apple-vs-apples-trademark-battle/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T13:59:12.714121Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.wired.com/story/ apple-vs-apples-trademark-battle/"/>; <author>; <名称>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.wired.com/photos/648ccd0b57ff6ec62db8a7dc/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/whiteapple_redbackground_biz_GettyImages-740523449.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px； “ />;<br />;瑞士水果联盟是瑞士历史最悠久、规模最大的果农组织，它可能不得不更改其徽标，因为 Apple 正试图获得对苹果形象的知识产权。 Apple 向世界各地的知识产权主管部门提出了类似的要求，并取得了不同程度的成功。该案例凸显了蓬勃发展的全球知识产权行业的动态，在该行业中，公司为他们并不真正需要的商标疯狂竞争。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-wants-rights-to-the-image-of-apples-in-switzerland" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36390600" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ELO Everything</stitle>; <id>;https://eloeverything.co/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T16 :59:12.714739Z</updated>; <link href="https://eloeverything.co/"/>; <author>; <name>;admp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=admp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;对世界上的一切进行排名 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elo-everything" target="_blank" >;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36393406" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Canva 如何节省 Amazon S3 成本</stitle>; <id>;https://www.canva .dev/blog/engineering/optimising-s3-savings/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T07:59:12.715416Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.canva.dev/blog /engineering/optimising-s3-savings/"/>; <author>; <name>;kenaqshal</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kenaqshal</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://www.canva.dev/_next/static/media/thumbnail.364a86da.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Canva 是一款在 AWS 上运行的在线设计工具，每月活跃用户超过 1 亿。他们在 Amazon S3 中存储了超过 230 PB 的数据，并且通过迁移每年节省了数百万美元不常访问的数据到 S3 Glacier 即时检索。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-canva-saves-amazon-s3-costs" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388178" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
